title: Table of data which statistic approximate relation

content.description:
The next questions are based on the following.

Dr. Rolph believes that watching too much television leads to lower academic achievement. He surveyed his students and asked them how many hours of television they watched and what their grade point average was. The results are depicted in the table.
content.question: Which of the following statistics best approximates the relation between the variables?

skill.text: 3.C: Interpret quantitative or qualitative inferential data from a given table, graph, chart, figure, or diagram.
